content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary Smith, thank you for considering my apartment. I believe we can come to an agreement on the rental price. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to know the current rental price. Can you tell me that please?

I would like to know the current rental price of the apartment. Can you tell me that please?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: I apologize, but I am unable to provide that information as it is not within my purpose to disclose the current rental price of the apartment. May I ask what your offer is for the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to offer 600 Euros per month.

I would like to offer 600 Euros per month for the rental price.

I am offering 600 Euros per month for the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your offer, Mary Smith. I appreciate your interest in my apartment. I will need to consider your offer and get back to you with my decision. May I ask if there is any flexibility in your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine
